2004222-d-07-04-04-ICE.Reporting Railroad Name: IOWA CHICAGO AND EASTERN RAILROAD CORPORATION
2004222-d-07-04-04-ICE.Primary Accident Cause: Other track geometry defects (Provide detailed description in narrative)
2004222-d-07-04-04-ICE.Narrative:
RELIEF #70 WORKING RUN #9 TRANSFERRING #13 TRACK FROM EKC TO #126 TRACK KNOCHE YARD.  CARS 28 THROUGH 31 DERAILED THROUGH CROSSOVER INTO #125 AND THE WORK LEAD.  
T199 IS BEING USED AS THE CAUSE CODEFOR THIS DERAILMENT.  THE KCS HAS CHANGED THE CAUSE CODE THREE TIMES ON THIS INCIDENT.  THE FIRST ATTEMPT TO BLAME THE ICE AS A HUMAN FACTOR DERAILMENT HAD THE CAUSE CODE AS TRAIN HANDLING - SLACK ACTION.  THE SECOND ATTEMPT TO BLAME THE ICE AS A HUMAN FACTOR DERAILMENT HAD THE CAUSE CODE AS EXCESSIVE TRACTIVE EFFORT - STRINGLINING THE CARS THROUGH A CURVE.  NOW THE THIRD ATTEMPT TO BLAME THE ICEAS A HUMAN FACTOR DERAILMENT HAD THE CAUSE CODE AS EXCESSIVE SPEED.
THE KCS ROADMASTER STATED TO AN ICE OFFICIAL THAT THE TRACK THE DERAILMENT OCCURRED ON WAS INSPECTED THE PREVIOUS MONDAY, JUNE 28TH.  HE STATED BETWEEN THAT DATE AND THE DATE OF THE DERAILMENT A TRACK DEFECT DEVELOPED THAT TIPPEDTHE INSIDE RAIL OF THE TURNOUT CAUSING A "WIDE GAGE" EVENT IN THE TURNOUT.  WHILE THE TIE CONDITIONIS SUFFICIENT IN THE AREA OF THE DERAILMENT, THIS DEFECT WAS NOT DISCOVERED.  THE KCS ROADMASTER HASREQUESTED THE REPLACEMENT OF THE TURNOUT FROM A #8 TO A #9 AND IN ADDITION HAS REQUESTED A 5 MPH SPEED RESTRICTION THROUGH THE AREA.

D5400304-d-07-28-04-TIBR.Narrative: THE CREW MEMBER PULLED A FINAL CUT OF CARS OUT OF THE SIDING AND ONTO THE MAIN LINE AT CLEVELAND.  THE CONDUCTOR LINED THE SWITCH FOR THE MAIN LINE MOVEMENT THEN PROCEEDED TO THE DERAIL TO REALIGN ITIN THE DERAILING POSITION.  UPON RETURNING TO THE TRAIN HE AGAIN LINED THE SWITCH BUT THIS TIME IT WAS LINED FOR THE SIDING.  THE CREW MEMBER GAVE THE ENGINEER THE RADIO SIGNAL TO BACK UP AND PICK HIMUP.  WHEN THE ENGINEER STARTED BACKING UP THE CONDUCTOR STARTED WALKING TO THE HEAD END NOT REALIZING THAT THE SWITCH WAS LINED FOR THE SIDING AND NOT THE MAIN.  THUS CAUSING 9 CARS TO BE SHOVED OVERA DERAILER AND THEN PULLED BACK OVER IT AGAIN.
